article:
'Today' is defunct afternoon newspaper from the India Today Group. Founded on 29
April 2002. [http://www.televisionpoint.com/lounge/lounge.php?id=1175461488
India Today Group] Television Point It was replaced by a newspaper called
Mail Today, which is published by a joint venture with Daily Mail [http://www.livemint.com/2007/11/13172221/India-Today-group-to-launch-
ta.html India Today group to launch tabloid in partnership with Daily Mail]
livemint.com (part of the Associated Newspapers group).
